alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 9:53PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Blaine County through 1015 PM MDT... At 952 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Hays, or 16 miles northwest of Zortman, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hays and Lodge Pole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall with this storm may lead to minor localized flooding, especially in low lying areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
